summary: A cynical workaholic gets suspicious of her banker father's sudden departure from his career and city life to move to a small town with unusually strong ties to Christmas.
cast: Nicole de Boer|Patrick Muldoon|Gig Morton|Garry Chalk|Jocelyne Loewen|Gabe Khouth|Karin Konoval|Peter Ruginis|Michael Roberds|David Mott|Tony Alcantar|Jennifer Copping|Wayne Bernard
title: El pueblo de la Navidad
